name: MIRAGE.GOLDEN.ZAB.DKLB
description:
MIRAGE系列第二弹，探索3d与2d风格融合界限，融入了一些新面孔，

过拟合的真人lora建议0.55-0.35，高权重容易直接出照片，欠拟合的1.5或者直接分层。

与The Golden Mirage的区别见图：

The second bullet in the MIRAGE series explores the boundaries of merging 3D and 2D styles, incorporating some new faces,

The difference from The Golden Mirage is shown in the following figure:
